item.title: Azure Policy - Magazine article
item.description: This article is written for the Xpirit Magazine #15 Imagine your company having a multitude of azure resources, and you want to ensure that all of them are compliant with your company’s standards.

item.title: Azure Virtual Desktop - Magazine article
item.description: In 2022 I published an article in our Xpirit Magazine #13 about Azure Virtual Desktop. In this post I will give you a summary of the article.
